_description: Configuration for batch protein design processing

_parameter_descriptions.chains: Chains to design for all PDBs (empty = auto-detect per PDB)
_parameter_descriptions.num_sequences: Number of sequences to generate per target PDB

specific_chains.description: Design specific chains for all PDBs

_batch_processing_notes.auto_chain_detection: When chains='' (empty), each PDB file is analyzed to determine available chains
_batch_processing_notes.output_structure: Creates one FASTA file per input PDB with all generated sequences
_batch_processing_notes.parsed_data: Creates parsed_pdbs.jsonl with structural data for all processed PDBs
_batch_processing_notes.performance: Processing time scales with number of PDBs and sequences per target
